CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Treatment_Status__c , "Cancelled"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015360000025L2e", "Cancelled,",40,40), IF(ISPICKVAL(Treatment_Status__c , "Pending Treatment Schedule"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015360000025IZS", "Pending Treatment Schedule,",40,40), IF(ISPICKVAL(Treatment_Status__c , "In Treatment"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015360000025IZS", "In Treatment,",40,40), IF(ISPICKVAL(Treatment_Status__c, "IC Scheduled"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015360000025IZN", "IC Scheduled",40,40),null))))
CustomField.label: Treatment Status Indicator
